description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 17, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST. All bids submitted after January 17, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 5P419-220051/A Lumber and Small Hardware with a closing date of October 25, 2022 at 14:00 PM PST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. This requirement is for the supply of goods in the form of lumber and small hardwares. The goods will be used as construction materials at Auyuittuq National Park, Pangnirtung, Nunavut. However, delivery of the goods will be to the following address, from where they will be transported by Parks Canada to Nunavut in the spring: Parks Canada Waterways; Delivery date - March 31, 2023; Delivery address: Parks Canada Wareways, 1840 Bourgogne Ave, Chambly QC. J3L 1Z3.

full_summary:
=================");
### Lumber and Small Hardware Tender Notice

**Notice ID:**
WS3763227993

**Publish Date:** December 20, 2022
**Closing Date:** January 17, 2023 - 2:00 pm EST

**Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for the supply of lumber and small hardware goods for use in construction at Auyuittuq National Park, Pangnirtung, Nunavut. The goods will be delivered to the Parks Canada Waterways in Chambly, Quebec, and transported by Parks Canada to Nunavut in the spring.

**Supply Requirements:**

* Lumber and small hardware goods
* Non-edible plant and forestry products
* Wood and sawmilling and lumber processing machinery and equipment

**Selection Criteria:**
The bid will be awarded based on the lowest cost-per-point.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Quebec (except NCR) and Chambly

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

* Nkechi Onwuama Ezechinedu
* Email: [nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14943229?extsite=MTQ5NDMyMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Status:** Expiré
**Tender Closing Date:** January 17, 2023 - 2:00 pm EST

Please be advised that the closing time for this tender has been modified. The bid must be submitted no later than January 17, 2023 - 2:00 pm EST. Any bids submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid on the previous solicitation.
